entry.title: First Day at Fullstack Academy
entry.content:
Today was my first day at Fullstack Academy. We spent a majority of the day getting to know the staff, teaching fellows and other students. It was a nice way to ease us into a new environment.

We also reviewed 3 problems from the Test First Javascript that we did during the Fullstack Foundations portion of the class. I definitely learned some new techniques I had not thought of before. I also felt a bit more confident in myself as a coder, since some of my answers were written exactly as Nimit demonstrated.

Iâ€™m looking forward to reviewing the rest of the Test First Problems and learning more about Javascript.

entry.title: Finished my hexo mailer project
entry.content: Today I finished my hexo mailer project for Fullstack Academy. I sent out a few emails (sent one to myself to make sure it worked!) and it seems like it works.

entry.title: What influenced and inspired you to learn to code?
entry.content: I was inspired to learn to code because of my wedding this past July. All of the wedding website templates looked very similar and I wanted to make something unique. So I began to study HTML and CSS on my own and eventually took a class at NYU that taught beginning HTML ,CSS, PHP and MySQL. It was during this class that I realized I really enjoyed coding and wanted to try to make a career out of it.
